subject: Libel and Slander
Golf
Newspapers
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: A judge dismissed the golfer John Daly’s libel lawsuit against a Florida newspaper and granted The Florida Times-Union’s request for summary judgment. Duval County Circuit Judge Hugh Carithers ruled that the former columnist Mike Freeman’s statements were either true or constitutionally protected opinion. Daly had sued in 2005, saying a column by Freeman written during the Players Championship that year defamed him. Freeman is a former reporter for The New York Times.
